discussion.author: cbrnr
discussion.text: This package provides support for reading [XDF files](https://github.com/sccn/xdf/wiki/Specifications). Since it seems to be common practice to name such packages after the file format they support, I would like to keep the name XDF.jl although it does not meet the two naming criteria.
